span.span: The West York Area School District Board of Directors is providing notice that the April voting meeting of the Board of School Directors will be held on Tuesday, April 21, 2020, at 6:30 PM.

West York Area School District is a public school entity located in south-central Pennsylvania serving approximately 3,000 students in kindergarten through 12th grade who live in the Borough of West York and the Township of West Manchester.
In West York, our purpose is twofold: 1) create opportunities for our students to thrive, and

2) to develop world-class citizens. Ultimately, our aim is to equip West York graduates for more and better opportunities to thrive in an increasingly complex and competitive society while also empowering graduates to lead with integrity, empathy, and respect for others.
Please feel free to contact us to discover how our highly qualified teachers and staff fulfill our mission of Every Student Every Day!

h2.span: HOW TO ACCESS YOUR SAPPHIRE ACCOUNT

span.span: the District will be offering free bag lunches
to children 18 years of age and younger
living in the West York area.
*** You will not enter the school building. Please drive up or walk up and a District representative will assist you. ***

West York Middle and High School students, teachers, and administrators attended the "Introduce A Girl to Engineering Day" on Feb. 20th, hosted by Buchart-Horn.
